com.epidemic_simulator

Interface SimulatorCallBack

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggressiveContactTracing, ContactTracingFailSafe, ContactTracingLightTest, FullControlledLockdownAndStopSpread, MediumControlledLockdown, PercentageLockDown, PercentageLockdownAndPartialStopSpread, StopEpidemyOnFirstRed, Strategy 

    public interface SimulatorCallBack
    This interface declares the methods necessary for the Simulator to issue ecallbacks to an object.
    NOTE: The Simulator only calls the methods of the SimulatorCallBacks that are registered.
    NOTE: The Simulator never calls methods of a Strategy before the first red person has been found.
    See Also:
    Simulator, Person

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterExecuteDay(Simulator.Outcome outcome)
      This method is called every time the Simulator finishes the simulation of a day.
      It can be useful for activating a strategy every day, or for running the Simulator in another Thread, and having callbacks.
      void personClean(Person person)
      This method is called every time a Person become Person.immune after they had Person.symptoms.
      void personHasSymptoms(Person person)
      This method is called every time a Person develop Person.symptoms.
      void registerEncounter(Person person1, Person person2)
      This method is called every time two Persons meets, it can be used for keeping a log of every meeting.

    • Method Detail

      • personHasSymptoms

        void personHasSymptoms(Person person)
        This method is called every time a Person develop Person.symptoms.
        Parameters:
        person - the person that developed symptoms

      • personClean

        void personClean(Person person)
        This method is called every time a Person become Person.immune after they had Person.symptoms.
        Parameters:
        person - the person that healed from having symptoms

      • registerEncounter

        void registerEncounter(Person person1,
                       Person person2)
        This method is called every time two Persons meets, it can be used for keeping a log of every meeting.
        Parameters:
        person1 - One of the two Persons
        person2 - The other Person

      • afterExecuteDay

        void afterExecuteDay(Simulator.Outcome outcome)
        This method is called every time the Simulator finishes the simulation of a day.
        It can be useful for activating a strategy every day, or for running the Simulator in another Thread, and having callbacks.
        Parameters:
        outcome - the outcome
